gurmukhi: ishjw sMjog piRX pRym rs Kyl jYsy pwCY bDU jnn sY grB smwvhI
transliteration: Sihajaa Sanjog Priy Praym Ras Khayl Jaisay , Paachhai Badhoo Janan Sai Garabh Samaavahee ?
translation: Just as a newly wedded bride uniting with her husband on the nuptial bed and after their love making lodges the seed of the child in her womb;

gurmukhi: pUrn ADwn Bey sovY gurjn ibKY jwgY prsUq smY sBn jgwvhI
transliteration: Pooran Adhaan Bhaay Sovai Gurjan Bikhai , Jaagai Parasoot Samai Sabhan Jagaavahee ?
translation: And on confirmation of her pregnancy sleeps in the company of other elderly ladies of the house, and on delivering the child, keeps herself and other elders awake at night;

gurmukhi: jnmq suq Kwn pwn mY sMjm krY qwN qy suq sMmRQ hÍY suKh idKwvhI
transliteration: Janamat Sout Khaan Paan Mai Sanjam Karai , Taan Tay Sout Sanmrad Hvai Soukhah Dikhaavahee ?
translation: And on birth of a son, she observes all preventions and precautions in her eating habits so as to ensure sound development of the son who will ultimately become a source of their comforts.

gurmukhi: qYsy gur Bytq BY Bwie isK syvw krY Alp Ahwr inMdRw sbd kmwvhI ]569]
transliteration: Taisay Gur Bhaytat Bhai Bhaai Sikh Sayvaa Karai , Alap Ahaar Nindraa Sabad Kamaavahee ?569?
translation: Similarly an obedient Sikh of the True Guru serves Him with complete devotion after surrendering himself before Him and abiding by His teachings. For obtaining the pleasure of Lord's union, he eats frugally and sleeps a little; and in the holy congregatio
